name: FilmKahani
overview: FilmKahani is a Bollywood related vernacular entertainment website where the user can read and contribute Hindi movie reviews, songsâ€™ lyrics, star biographies, news and gossips. The complete content of the site is in Hindi. The biggest USP of our site is that it connects the user with Bollywood in a language which they can understand. The site aims to reach out to the millions of Bollywood lovers who wish to read about their favourite movies and stars but are not able to make complete usage of Internet due to language barriers. The site contains reviews of 1000+ Hindi movies and you can find reviews of movies as old as Mother India.
